column1: Smoque BBQ////The facts. St.Louis Ribs. Bomb diggidy. Big ol' smoke ring (the pink lining under the skin for newbies). They remove the translucent skin underneath the rib
column2: hate when places don't do that. Hugs the bone gently
column3: doesn't fall off the bone (that's a no-no
column4: again for you newbs). Sliced brisket
column5: that's one BIG OHHH YEAHHH! Masterfully cooked with and almost pillowy texture. No sauce needed. Pulled pork's good
column6: but I'd prefer a vinegar based sauce for PP (can't all get what we want though).
